overview: Anyone who goes to Spain goes for any one of three reasons – the weather, the food or the sex. No prizes for guessing what attracted the likes of Kris Blent, Ray Mannix and Gabriel Angel to this Mediterranean idyll, of course. Needless to say, the Iberian sunshine and fine cuisine were secondary attractions once their hosts – Ruben Bart and Josh Milk – had provided them with the very warmest (and horniest) of welcomes; resulting in another mindless round of outdoor fornication and copious amounts of jizz. Sunny Spain has never looked hotter!
title: Sun, Sangria And Sex
